Andy Coulson survives committee hearing MPs treat Andy Coulson with considerable scepticism as he tells him them he knew nothing of the phone hacking happening during his tenure as editor of News of the World. I never condoned the use of phone hacking, nor do I have any recollection of phone hacking taking place, he insists. Ob auch Stellen in der Schweiz geschaffen werden, konnte ein Google-Sprecher auf Anfrage noch nicht sagen.
